name: Sidharth Dang

projects.name: Terra Crafted 3D Ecommerce Web App
projects.description: Built a 3D Ecommerce Web App using MERN stack with immersive product visualization. Utilized three.js for 3D implementation. Ensured secure authentication and seamless API communication for engaging user interactions.

projects.name: Homyz Full Stack Web App
projects.description: Developed MERN stack social media platform. Constructed a responsive web application for social engagement. Employed advanced hashing techniques to enhance data security and integrity for password protection.

experiences.description: Proficiently maintained company website, ensuring consistent performance, security, and functionality. Developed multiple projects using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, delivering high-quality solutions tailored to client needs. Utilized version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage project codebase, facilitating seamless collaboration and code management.

Spearheaded the development of diverse projects using React.js and Sass, showcasing a keen eye for detail and proficiency in modern web development frameworks. Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces with React.js, enhancing user engagement and accessibility across various devices and platforms. Leveraged the power of Sass to streamline CSS development, promoting code maintainability, scalability, and reusability.

Collaborated closely with the design and backend teams to translate project requirements into intuitive and visually appealing frontend solutions. Integrated third-party libraries and APIs to enhance website functionality and performance, expanding its capabilities and features. Stayed updated with the latest trends and advancements in frontend development, continuously improving skills and adopting new technologies to drive innovation.
